title: C. K-Dominant Character
statement:
You are given a string s consisting of lowercase Latin letters. Character c is called k-dominant iff each substring of s with length at least k contains this character c.

You have to find minimum k such that there exists at least one k-dominant character.
inputSpecification: The first line contains string s consisting of lowercase Latin letters (1 ≤ |s| ≤ 100000).
outputSpecification: Print one number — the minimum value of k such that there exists at least one k-dominant character.
name: K-Dominant Character
